name: Event Management UI Design
desc: Eventify is a clean, data-driven dashboard UI concept for event organizers, designed for easy booking management, attendee insights, and scalable user experience.

name: Distributor Management System
desc: A web-based Distributor Management System to handle sales, purchases, inventory, returns, payments and reporting. Built with PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, and Bootstrap.

name: Cloud Storage Service UI Design
desc: A modern, user-centric UI design for a cloud storage platform focused on trust, clarity, and usability. With clean layouts and intuitive navigation.

name: Cleaning Service App
desc: A full-stack Cleaning Service Management System with user authentication and an admin panel. Built with React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, JWT and deployed on Vercel.

name: Travel Website UI Design
desc: A clean, vibrant UI designed in Canva to showcase Sri Lankaâ€™s beauty. Combines tropical visuals with intuitive layout to inspire travel and exploration.

name: Baby Care Management System
desc: Built a web application to help mothers and midwives manage antenatal care efficiently, using HTML, CSS, JS, PHP, MySQL, and Figma for design.

name: Student Management System
desc: Developed a PHP and MySQL web application. It allows users to add, edit, and delete student records, with data stored in a MySQL database.

name: Sun Crush Web UI Design
desc: Designed a colorful web UI concept for a Sun Crush beverage brand, focusing on flavor-based themes and clean, user-friendly design using Figma.

name: Wizard's Flight Game
desc: A browser-based, Harry Potter themed game created with HTML, CSS and JavaScript. This project demonstrates web development and basic game mechanics

name: Scientific Calculator
desc: A user-friendly scientific calculator using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. The project improved my problem-solving and coding skills.

name: Cricket Quiz Website
desc: Created an cricket quiz website using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, this interactive platform offers a collection of engaging quizzes that will test your cricket knowledge.

name: Online Social Network Library System
desc: Developed an Online Social Network Library System using HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, PHP and MySQL. Hosted with XAMPP and managed with Git.
